text: Siber cabinet was the government of Northern Cyprus between 6 June 2013 and 2 September 2013, led by Prime Minister Sibel Siber. It was formed as an interim caretaker government after the Küçük cabinet led by İrsen Küçük of the National Unity Party fell in a vote of no confidence. It led Northern Cyprus until the 2013 parliamentary election. == Composition == The composition of the cabinet was as seen below: {|class="wikitable" |- ! Office !! Name !!colspan="2"| Party |- | Prime Minister || Sibel Siber ||style="background- color: "| || CTP |- | Minister of Foreign Affairs || Kutlay Erk ||style="background-color: "| || CTP |- | Minister of Finance || Zeren Mungan ||style="background-color: "| || CTP |- | Minister of Interior and Local Administration || Gülsün Yücel ||style="background-color: "| || CTP |- | Minister of Labor and Social Security || Aziz Gürpınar ||style="background- color: "| || CTP |- | Minister of Transport and Public Works || İsmail Başarır ||style="background-color:"| || DP |- | Minister of Economy and Energy || Atay Ahmet Raşit ||style="background-color:"| || DP |- | Minister of Health || Nuri Gökşin ||style="background-color: "| || DP |- | Minister of National Education, Youth and Sports || Asım İdris ||style="background-color:"| || TDP |- | Minister of Agriculture and Natural Resources || Sami Dayıoğlu ||style="background-color: "| ||TDP |- | Minister of Tourism, Environment and Culture || Mehmet Harmancı ||style="background-color:"| || TDP |- |} == References == Category:Cabinets of Northern Cyprus
title: Siber cabinet
